amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language which allows fiscal year 2002 funds available to the Department of Defense for assistance to the Government of Colombia to be made available to support a unified campaign against narcotics trafficking, and against activities by certain organizations designated as terrorist organizations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 and printed in the Congressional Record on May 20, 2002 to strike the bill's provision allowing counternarcotics funds provided for Columbia to be used as part of a wider cmapaign against terrorist groups in that country.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 225 (Roll no. 202).
